WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
in the file [TFS Branching Guide - Scenarios 2.0.pdf] in page 9 the following text
 
"Dev - child branches of main where developers work on the current on future versions on the product."
 
i think has an error and must be
 
"Dev - child branches of main where developers work on the current or future versions on the product."
 
Regards

Comments.Message:
Thanks for adding this issue.
I will be working on refreshing the guidance soon. 
The scenarios document will be one of my main focus areas.
Regards,
Bill Heys
VS ALM Ranger
